185864531.review: A very fun and cute little game. I played the original Spore to death and I think this is the definitive way to play Spore. The Space Stage is actually enjoyable thanks to this DLC which I originally thought of as boring. Most of the adventures are pretty creative and fun so I'd recommend you'd try them out! I also like the Adventure-Maker and it is my favorite part of the game now, even if it is a bit clunky.

J'aime beaucoup Spore mais je regrette d'avoir à abandonner ma partie avancée pour jouer à ce DLC
Et de devoir choisir entre ce DLC là ou l'autre pour ma nouvelle partie...
Bon, j'excuse la vieillesse du jeu, ça reste une expérience amusante et qui change pas mal du spore habituel/de base.

Si jamais : L'installer sur Steamdeck est possible, mais trèèès difficile. J'ai mis pas moins de 3 jours pour trouver comment faire et facilement 15 jours pour y arriver. (je suis quelqu'un d'assez déterminé)

185286377.review: one of the greatest games ever created

184977085.review:
I remember buying the creature creator when I was maybe 8 or 9? I fell in love with it immediately. Little did I know that the full game was releasing in just over 1 week. I was absolutely HYPED. Made probably 500 creatures each with their own backstory and different personalities. Then this game came out and it was filled with everything I had done. I loved it then, I love it now. Just wish that this game would get an updated remaster for consoles.....

The variety you have in the creature you make, the buildings, what you do? is ENDLESS. The galaxy is your oyster, quite literally and figuratively. If you want a game that stretches your  imagination and then some.....here it is.

184658830.review:
The most important feature of the game, sharing creations with other, got disabled so the game cant be recommended anymore.
No, complicated unofficial bug fixes which can work do not fucking count.

Also many mods got lost and/or are not compatible with the Steam version of the game. In fact not a single mod which I tried worked with the Steam version and without mods this game is not worth playing in singleplayer.

The extra parts from the infamous Dr. Pepper scam campaign are also NOT included in the Steam version. Despicable behavior by EA, like always. 

Game crashes randomly which means your progress gets reseted everytime unless you constantly saveing the game... 


Just fuck off, EA

183881382.review:
银河冒险DLC是太空阶段的补充，把接取的任务变为更具象化、个体化的体验，解锁一些星港和陆地上的独特地图，原本本体的太空阶段主要是探索、贸易和策略，单纯看DLC的扩展内容，接取任务-真实地降落至任务地点-完成任务-获取奖励。还可以加点升级，体验起来倒更像是RPG玩法了。而这也让整体的太空阶段游玩体验变得更加立体深入，给我们创建的独一无二的生物一个更好的展示舞台。
网上有汉化和解除锁帧的教程，挺好找的

183794142.review:
The game is one of the greatest masterpieces of 2000's, but EA blew it as no one could
The game and it's two DLC's sold as a 3 separate games, which you must install in the right order, fix on this matter can be done with one man and one day of work maximum, EA just won't give a shit about any of the good games they had decades ago (not to mention titanfall2)
Then to ACTUALLY get the content you paid for (sporepedia online and spore account) - you need to contact EA support and throw receipts to them, then have an EA account registered as well
My  advice - download the game from torrents, maxis is no more anyway
If you really want the sporepedia - buy&refund to receive the account

183575930.review: The game will not let you set up an account because you did not buy it directly from EA Games. Tech support on EA Games is suspicious. They ask for information like your home address, phone number, credit card info, screenshots of email purchases, screenshots of Steam purchases, and account information. They even ask for your private IP address. I stopped the conversation with EA games. They kept asking for more and more info after proof of purchase, enough info that if I answered anymore, it would open me up to being hacked. Be Careful!!!
